Package packstock

Class Stock

java.lang.Object
packstock.Stock
public class Stock
extends java.lang.Object
Class that allows to represent a Stock composed of Products
Version:
v1
Author:
PMOO teachers, Oihan Irastorza

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Stock.UnknowCodeException
    Exception that gets raised when a given product code doesn't match any product code inside the stock

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Stock getInstance()
      Returns the Stock class instance (following Singleton pattern)
      Returns:
      the Stock class instance

    • getNextCode

      public int getNextCode()
      Increments the value of lastCode and returns it
      Returns:
      the next code value

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct​(Product p)
      Adds a Product to the list
      Parameters:
      p - the product to be added

    • numberOfProducts

      public int numberOfProducts()
      Obtains the number of Products in the list
      Returns:
      the number of products (list size)

    • removeProduct

      public void removeProduct​(Product p)
      Removes the given Product from the list. If the product does not exist, it shows a message
      Parameters:
      p - the product that will be removed

    • removeProduct

      public void removeProduct​(int code) throws Stock.UnknowCodeException
      Removes the product with the given code from the list. If the product does not exist, it shows a message
      Parameters:
      code - of the product that will be removed
      Throws:
      Stock.UnknowCodeException - if there is not product that matches the code

    • updateAmount

      public void updateAmount​(int code, int amount) throws NegativeAmountException, Stock.UnknowCodeException
      Updates the amount of the product with the given code with the given amount
      Parameters:
      code - code of the Product to be updated
      amount - amount to set
      Throws:
      NegativeAmountException - if amount is negative
      Stock.UnknowCodeException - if there is not product that matches the code

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • storeStockInFile

      public void storeStockInFile()
      Writes the stock on a file

    • obtainProduct

      public Product obtainProduct​(int code) throws Stock.UnknowCodeException
      Returns the product that matches the code passed by parameter
      Parameters:
      code - the product code
      Returns:
      a Product object that matches the code passed by parameter
      Throws:
      Stock.UnknowCodeException - is a product with specified code does not exist

    • containsProduct

      public boolean containsProduct​(Product p)
      Checks if the product passed by parameter is in the stock
      Parameters:
      p - the product to check if exist in stock
      Returns:
      true == the product is in the stock. Otherwise, returns false

    • stockSize

      public int stockSize()
      Returns stock size
      Returns:
      stock size

    • obtainProductListToOrder

      public java.util.ArrayList<Product> obtainProductListToOrder​(int n)
      Returns a list of products that its amount is lesser than the number passed by parameter passed by parameter
      Parameters:
      n - the amount to filter
      Returns:
      a list of products that its amount is lesser than the amount passed by parameter

    • removeAllProductsWith0Units

      public void removeAllProductsWith0Units()
      Removes all product from stock which its amount is 0
